title: How to get more answers on my Quora questions - Quora

response.answer_text: Ask questions related to popular or trending things such as Donald Trump, The super bowl, etc.Request people to answer your questions that are suitable to do soAsk “what is” “what are” “what will” type questions. These generally get lots of answersAsk questions about personal experiences, such as “what’s your favorite country?” “What’s the best thing you did this year?”That’s all I got. Cheers.

Ask interesting questions that are open ended and do not overtly display your bias on the subject. Follow more people. The more people you follow, the more will follow you and your question will appear to more Quorans in their feeds. Answer Questions of interest to you with thoughtful concise answers. As you become more well known, more Quorans will also read your questions. As an FYI..I left Quora several years ago and have only been back since last summer. Few of the people I ’knew’ then are still here. Yet I have close to a thousand followers simply because I write answers that seem to appeal to people.
